This is an R Markdown document for save the outputs of statistical analysis.

```{r include = FALSE, message = FALSE}
source("code/output.R")
```

### Proportion of tandem run
Compare the proportion of time spent in tandem runs.  
data was logit transformed after adding 0.01 to avoid infinitive value.  
```{r message = FALSE}
stat_tandem_duration()
```

### Tandem duration
Compare the duration of each tandem running events using coxme() model.  
```{r message = FALSE}
stat_tandem_duration_surv()
```

### Speed comparison
Compare the speed difference between followers (faster) and leaders (slower) after 5 second after separation.  
```{r message = FALSE}
stat_speed_comparison()
```
